com.ames.uncover.impl

Class Segment<ITEM>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ames.uncover.impl.Segment<ITEM>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvailableSegment

    public class Segment<ITEM>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the range (interval) of items, but does not include items themselves. The class is used directly to store the fetch queries that do not include items. The derived class AvailableSegment also provide field to store the data. The segment is normally expected to cover the single page. The segment always belongs to the model that is required to compute values dependent on the page size.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
